feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. PDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Smoke, 16.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Smoke
Temperature: 16.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 10 km
Humidity: 25 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 5

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Widespread smoke becoming local smoke this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Risk of thunderstorms near the Rockies late in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 19. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low 7.
